de.iftm.dcm4che.router.gui
Class DicomRouterGUI.FilteredStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          de.iftm.dcm4che.router.gui.DicomRouterGUI.FilteredStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
Enclosing class:
DicomRouterGUI
 class DicomRouterGUI.FilteredStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream

Inner member class for handling the output of System.out and System.err to the JTextArea intead of standard out and err.

Field Summary
private  int MAXIMUM_LENGTH_OF_TEXT
          Maximum length of text in the text area for logging (= 65535).

Method Detail

write

public void write(byte[] b)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes b.length bytes from the specified byte array to this output stream. The length of the text is limited to the MAXIMUM_LENGTH_OF_TEXT characters.

Overrides:
write in class java.io.FilterOutputStream
Parameters:
b - the data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

write

public void write(byte[] b,
                  int off,
                  int len)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes len bytes from the specified byte array starting at offset off to this output stream. The length of the text is limited to the MAXIMUM_LENGTH_OF_TEXT characters.

Overrides:
write in class java.io.FilterOutputStream
Parameters:
b - the data.
off - the start offset in the data.
len - the number of bytes to write.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

write

private void write(java.lang.String s)
            throws java.io.IOException
Writes a String to this output stream. The length of the text is limited to the MAXIMUM_LENGTH_OF_TEXT characters.

Parameters:
